LanguageData.ClutterWoodTileA.description: Dark 나무 panels with a dark border around each 바닥. 미관 : 2.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor2.label: 갈색 나무 바닥
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor2.description: Thin vertical brown 판자. For that warm homey feeling. 미관 : 3.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor3.label: 밝은색 나무 판자
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor3.description: Staggered joint, light colored 나무 바닥ing in short, horizontal 판자. 미관 : 3.

LanguageData.ParquetFloor.description: Herringbone 바닥ing. Regal elegance for the sophisticated colonist. Takes some time to build. 미관 : 3.
